httpdocs
Table of Contents

CreateSipAuthCallsCredentialListMapping

Create a new credential list mapping resource

HTTP Request

POST \2010-04-01\Accounts\{AccountSid}\SIP\Domains\{DomainSid}\Auth\Calls\CredentialListMappings.json HTTP/1.1

host: api.twilio.com:443
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

Parameters

AccountSid [ in: path type: string ]
The SID of the Account that will create the resource. required
DomainSid [ in: path type: string ]
The SID of the SIP domain that will contain the new resource. required

Request Body Schema

{
"title": "CreateSipAuthCallsCredentialListMappingRequest",
"required": [
"CredentialListSid"
],
"type": "object",
"properties": {
"CredentialListSid": {
"maxLength": 34,
"minLength": 34,
"pattern": "^CL[0-9a-fA-F]{32}$",
"type": "string",
"description": "The SID of the CredentialList resource to map to the SIP domain."
}
}
}

Responses

  • 201 Created
